resources.string: Tap as many tiles as you can!

\t When the game begins, you will search for the smallest tile in the grid and begin tapping them in ascending order.\n\n \t When you encounter a tile that contains the UP digit or is a multiple of the UP digit, you need to avoid it by tapping the UP button instead.
Your UP digit for this round is...
\ The game is developed by MatchaLatte
There is no old game to continue.Would you like to start a new Game?
This Demo does not have time limit.

When the game begins, search for the smallest tile in the grid and begin tapping them in ascending order.\n When you encounter a tile that contains the UP digit or is a multiple of the UP digit, tap the UP button instead.
The UP digit for this demo is 4.
Press START when you are ready!

When the game begins, search for the smallest tile in the grid and begin tapping them in ascending order.
 When you encounter a tile that contains the UP digit or is a multiple of the UP digit, tap the UP button instead.
 The UP digit for this demo is 4.
